functions.name: getURIsForTags
functions.description: This method retrieves all URIs set for the given tags.

functions.name: getTagsForURI
functions.description: This method retrieves all tags set for the given URI.

parameters.name: URI
parameters.description: The URI for which to return the tags.

functions.name: tagURI
functions.description: This method sets tags for the given URI. Any existing tags are kept

parameters.name: URI
parameters.description: The URI to set the tags on.

functions.name: untagURI
functions.description: This method removes tags for the given URI. Any existing tags are kept

parameters.name: URI
parameters.description: The URI to unset the tags on.

functions.name: getWindowID
functions.description: This method retrieves the current X window ID
